sentences.sContent: She is right to deplore the pogroms against Jews and the beginning of the inquisition.
sentences.sContent_eng: She is right to deplore the pogroms against Jews and the beginning of the inquisition.
sentences.sCn: 她正确地谴责对犹太人的大屠杀和开始执行宗教法庭。

words.tran: 好奇的；好问的，爱打听的

trans.tranOther: a Roman Catholic organization in the past whose aim was to find and punish people who had unacceptable religious beliefs
